USAGE REQUIREMENT.  ULtraID3Lib can be used free-of-charge in any commercial or non-commercial application or web page, so long as the usage is noted in one or more of the following locations (in order of preference).

   About screen (or any place the referencing application or web page notes its copyright or ownership information)
   Help file
   Readme file
   User manual/instructions
   Any location, as appropriate to the application, where the user might reasonably be expected to see the notation


Usage notation format (when hyperlinking is available):

   [Insert your product name here] uses <a href="www.UltraID3Lib.com">UltraID3Lib</a>, an MP3 ID3 Tag Editor and MPEG Info Reader Library
   Copyright 2002 - 2010 <a href="www.HundredMilesSoftware.com">Hundred Miles Software</a> (Mitchell S. Honnert)


Usage notation format (when hyperlinking is not available):

   [Insert your product name here] uses UltraID3Lib, an MP3 ID3 Tag Editor and MPEG Info Reader Library
   Copyright 2002 - 2010 Hundred Miles Software (Mitchell S. Honnert)
   www.UltraID3Lib.com, www.HundredMilesSoftware.com
